Message: How is my performance, I know it wasn't perfect.
Your pitch was slightly off-key in some parts, but your tone and emotion were spot on! What do you think went wrong?
I am the best singer of the world right?
Ha ha, not quite yet! But seriously, you have great potential. Focus on your breath control and practice those tricky notes. You're getting close!
I know I am a bad singer, and probably You think it too.
Oh no, don't say that! You have a unique voice and style. It takes courage to share your talents with others. Keep practicing and believing in yourself!
